verbose_text: While the number of S100beta + astrocytes) is significantly increased in the splenium of CX 3 CR1 +/+ and CX 3 CR1 +/- mice following CPZ treatment as compared with control CX 3 CR1 +/+ and CX 3 CR1 +/- mice (p = 0.0270 and p = 0.0159 respectively), the small increase in astrocyte density within the splenium of CPZ treated CX 3 CR1 -/- mice was not statistically significant after correction for multiple testing (p = 0.6375; p = 0.0425 without multiple testing correction).
evidence: S100beta + astrocytes                                                        ) is significantly increased in the splenium of CX 3 CR1 +/+  and CX 3 CR1
